GUIController - Class in client.ClientViews
GUI controller manages the GUI.
GUIController(ClientController) - Constructor for class client.ClientViews.GUIController
Constructor, using a given client.
GUIController.CheckoutCart - Class in client.ClientViews
Actionlistener class for the checkout confirmation prompt.
GUIController.Refresh - Class in client.ClientViews
Inner ActionListener class listens for the "Refresh" button to be pressed, whereupon a the displays are updated and a loading circle is shown.
GUIController.Refresh.LoadThread - Class in client.ClientViews
An inner class for the Refresh class used to display the loading circle for a certain period of time.
GUIController.searchItem - Class in client.ClientViews
Document listener for searching for items
GUIController.SelectCart - Class in client.ClientViews
Nested class selection listener for the selection of items in the cart.
GUIController.SelectCart.RemoveItem - Class in client.ClientViews
Nested inner class action listener for the remove item button Removes a selected item from the cart.
GUIController.SelectItem - Class in client.ClientViews
inner ListSelectionListener class handles objects that have been selected by the user.
GUIController.SelectItem.AddItem - Class in client.ClientViews
inner ActionListener class listens for the "Sell Item" button to be pressed, whereupon a dialogue box asking for a specified amount will appear.
GUIController.ViewCart - Class in client.ClientViews
Inner class implements action listener to display the cart.
GUIController.WindowClose - Class in client.ClientViews
Inner ActionListener class listens for main window events, mainly when the window is closed.
